SEARCH
Package domain

Class WolfLotVol

java.lang.Object
domain.Animal
domain.Mammal
domain.WolfLotVol
All Implemented Interfaces:
Unit
public class WolfLotVol extends Mammal
The WolfLotVol class represents a wolf following the Lotka-Volterra model. It moves randomly, hunts sheep, and can reproduce with nearby wolves.

  • Field Summary

    • act

      public void act()
      Description copied from interface: Unit
      Defines the specific behavior of the unit during one simulation step. Each concrete class (like Wolf, Sheep, or Grass) must implement this method to describe its own actions in the valley.
